values: I have been reunited with my brother (Jake) and we are living together for the summer semester...at least until I go to boot camp in July. I am going to be an officer and I have been accepted into the counter-intelligence program Arabic speaking!!! I am very excited to be in this program. I have always been patriotic and had the desire to serve my country and now I will be able to do so in the best way. It has been a year since my last entry...oops! But all that happened was I went through a couple gir;friends, found a great one and passed all my classes while joining the military. I am still alive and kikin'!!!

Well, it has been a tidy bit o' time since I last wrote something in my journal here. I have been busy with summer semestre and such...but I am alive and I do feel well. Merry Christmas to all and to all a good time!

Hello! Who are you?...I am the walrus. Why do you ask?..Oh, then I see Queen Mab hath been with you. She is the Faeries midwife and she comes in shape no bigger than an agate stone on the fore finger of an alderman. Drawn by a teem of little atomi over men's noses as they lie asleep. Yeah, I am well and sick in the head! Teaou ka mana seka.

Merchant is rockin' and Romeo & Juliet is rollin'; soon I'll be free from the many rehersals and performances. It is a good day to be alive...I need to finish my design for R&J in the next few days...so I can be thru with everything. The hippo never smiles at the croc.

Take the quiz: "Which American City Are You?"

Los Angeles
You are the epitome of duality. You'll deal with all the strife to bask in all the glamour.

Well, do I join the Marines or do I finish my college education? The answer is obvious...school is the major priority. Besides there will be plenty of time to serve my country after college. Thanx for tollerating me Jake.

Aparrently Easter was this last sunday...Iwas too busy to notice. My Jazz band played at "The Blue Cat" Saturday night it was awsome but it was a 4 hour set so that kinda bit! All my friends were elsewhere for the weekend but I stayed here...alone...doing homework! It's all well and kind. I ain't no friekin' monument to justice! And I am most certainly not...? Good day to ya'!

What is wrong?....Nothing! Everything is much better. Now I just need to take care of employment and next semester and everything will be fine...great even. Jake is the best friend that I have and probably the only one that I fully trust. Jaynann is a dear heart and I have no idea what she sees in me. I am greatfull for her and for Jake.

I am calm in the universe

But at war on earth

I must find rest and peace

Where will it take me?

I feel too much anger

I feel too little joy

Why? Why not?

My home is only in me

It must be like a tree

Strong in itself

Not opposing the motion of the Universe.

My home.

Wow! I really like the song "Silver and Cold" by A.F.I. !!!

Well, Merchant goes up this next weekend....uh...it'll be fine?!

R&J is commin' up in 2 weeks and Complete works is the same. All in all thhis is going to be a hectic month...but fun, very fun!  Rotten food is bad for you!

 A>F>I>

Hmmm.....what do I do?

I  am loving dis wheada' we are having...yah!

In the end I am still breathing...and I am at peace.

Wow! What a crazy weekend...huh?! Well, everything is totally cool now so...on with the good life. I wish my past would not trouble me so much, but it is a part of who I have become; so I should just learn from my mistakes and be the best man I can be. It feels like a new life somehow...'course that's what happens every spring...new life. Today is a good day to be alive. Enjoy it! I give a special "Thank you" to Jaynann and Jacobenoit...!

Hello! How are you? Salutations my hard rockin' amigo!
Wait! They don't love you like I love you.
Everything is totally cool. Merchant is memorized and rollin'; now all I have to worry about is Romeo and Juliet, Complete works, and my scene for class next tuesday. I love my baby sister Anna Jane and my girlfriend Jaynann!...hmmm...that's an odd coincidence! Oh well!
Today is beautiful and I'm lovin' life; things are gonna' work out just fine!
Jake is my best friend and although I give him a lot of crap, he's still patient and cool! ...well, on with the day!
Zeiram commeth! Flee to the hills unless you are Great Warrior Man! Like Me and Jake(or a lady warrior like the mighty Jaynann)!
I love Jaynann! She is Hot, wow, way hot!

Wow! I'm so busy I can't even tie my shoes in the proper way!

Don't eat shoe soles.

What an absolutly beautiful day!  I lost my script for merchant again! CRAP!!!!!! Oh, well, I'll get by without it. Man... Jake, Ian, and I have such an awsome friendship...like the three amigos...or the three musketeers...or...something else that is cool, that has to do with three guys that totally rock! Oh, yes, we definitively ROCK!

Today I have economics as a social science...um...it really is a good class I just don't appreciate all the homework...after that, I have some Opus singing and before it I have acting styles: Greek to Retoration -very cool! Well, be cool my HARD ROCKIN' AMIGOS!!!

This last weekend was soo good for my friends and me. Jakes girlfriend Kase came up with her mother and we went on a drive up the canyon to enjoy the radically awsome environment up there. Then yesterday we went down to Zion National park and took a great hike up to the middle and upper emerald pools...Absolutly breathtaking. It is seldom that one partakes of such natural loveliness...so, since it is only an hour away we are getting an annual pas and we're goin' every weekend possible. Kase is an awsome kid!-yeah well, she is 18 but I am still 5-6 years older than everyone so I feel like the older brother alot!

Kase's mom is soo cool though! What an awsome lady, hangin' with a buch a' crazy college kids and totally chillin'! I had such a rad time; I hope Kase brings her mom whenever she can get away. Jake is kinda' odd though...he is soo worried about how Kase will fit in and how his friends will respond to her. She is a cool Kat! No worries! We're gonna' have a good time...Always! Everything is gonna' be great. Camping, hiking, and all the wilderness survival you can handle!

The blue and the green run together to the endless sky!

A calm and beautiful day bids me a peaceful salutation this morning and then I feel the weight of my responsibilities and I forget how to breathe.

It's alright though, it will be a good day.
What an absolutly beautiful day. I think I'll buy that Ferrari 575 modificatta marenello!  OOOOOOHHHH!!! How sweet it is.

What a beautifull desert rose.
Nice...uh...inches! I've never been a tree.-maybe I should.

Feelin' fine.

...well that's a relief!

I think I'll go bake something.

No, really, I fell fine.

Where's my glock jake?  ...model 23......40 calibur.

...A giant potato whispers secrets of the eutruscan empire in a pool of green jello.

...yup!

Red!

The colour of my rage!!!

Blue, the colour of my soul!!!

Well, it was a good time but I guess women and I just kant be left alone. Why eveyone seems to want to invade others buisness and dictate terms I will never understand; it has affected me for the last time. I backed down from the first fight ever last night, solely because I was asked; "please don't do this". 

   Therefore, I am finished. Soldier mode may piss people off but it works and it prevents me from hurting anyone else. I just need to mind my own buisness and everything will be fine. A lesson I have a hard time learning.

Few things in life are better than waking up next to a beautifull woman...at times it could be considered one of the greatest reasons for living. The human race perhaps may have some redeamable qualities...women. Yeah, I grudgingly and yet whole-heartedly admit it.
I love Jaynann! She rocks...yup! Oh, and buy more stamps.

Today is far too precious a day to waste time on foolish girls childishness...although I do not wish to seem cruel. Life is life but then, a man's fate is a man's fate and Life is just an illusion. Well on to the sunshine. I think I'll Iron my dreams.

Well, I didn't kill anyone over the break so I guess things are good. I just hung out at my house and read books, watched movies, and made some cool shit for fun. I could have thrown a bad ass party but I was more concerned with relaxation rather than cleaning up puke from people I don't know. Life is good and it's a beautifull day.

 Oh yeah, my ex-girlfriend came down and tried to get back together with me. That sucked! I thought things were done and clear but I was wrong...and so I had to break her heart once again. She cried and yelled at me but I had to be honest. I am not in love with her as I once was. I told her to move on and just be my friend if she could. Well, she gave back to me everything I had given her (a rather childish feat) notes and pictures and the like. Including a ring that I had given her...white gold and a rare tanzanite stone. WHAT THE HELL DO I DO WITH THAT? Well, I'll figure it out. Take care my my Hard Rockin' amigos!

Fly you crazy butterfly,

Over the masses of adolescent trout farmers,

Never breathe the poison of their songs.

End your jouney when the purple haze comes,

Pillfering the countyside with its petrolium tears.

It cries for the lives of the rotted carcases,

Festering on the beaches of a thousand love songs.

But she will never sing her song,

Choked at the throat by the deathless sunrise

That robbs from her beauty to fuel his arogant pulse.

Where has the butterfly gone

I see her fly by night with mountain dew bleeding from her uterous.

I watch her strait into the purple death,

And she falls. But her blood sows an endless river of mother.

 But still she falls,

And I stand in my heart and watch.

While abercrombie and bitch play with gap kids in petro-piazza.

Who sing songs of corporate capitalism and cookie cut humans

To lament the passing of the butterfly;

Who taught their hearts about Terra's pulse.

Where does the nightmare die

But in the sunset...he is the gleaming garbage of a dead romantic

Long bereft of dignity.

But her mother is still love.

                                 -Elijah

tiptoeing through the used condoms
strewn on the piers
off the west side highway
sunset behind
the skyline of jersey
walking towards the water
with a fetus holding court in my gut
my body highjacked
my tits swollen and sore
the river has more colors at sunset
than my sock drawer ever dreamed of
i could wake up screaming sometimes
but i don't
i could step off the end of this pier but
i've got shit to do
and i've an appointment on tuesday
to shed uninvited blood and tissue
i'll miss you i say
to the river to the water
to the son or daughter
i thought better of
i could fall in love
with jersey at sunset
but i leave the view to the rats
and tiptoe back

              -Ani DiFranco

Well, I had to have "the talk" with my 'love interest' and be decisive and firm about the friends thing. Just good friends...I won't be led on. If the pressure and stress of graduating, finding a graduate school, and falling in love is too great; then let's cut the relationship thing out and you just take care of you. I am far too busy to have to dedicate time to someone who wants to be with me but can't because of secular strife. Everything will be just fine...no worries. Cool enough for me though, I actually don't feel that broken up. Therefore, I think i'll have a great day! Life is too precious ya' know...! So, keep yer heads on straight my HARD ROCKIN' AMIGOS!!!

My what a beautifull day! Makes me wish that I was still in Santa Monica...oh well...you can't have everything. Anyhow school is going to be quite fun in the next few weeks so...I have afeeling that although it will be busy the many performances will ROCK! On with the show as they say...and the homework.

What seems to be the trouble with the gravitational constant of the Universe? The past few days have been fairly busy..what with Susana and Mechant and all. I have no Idea as to why I have so much RAGE inside but man any time I get frustrated with something I have the hardest time not slamming my fists through things. Life is far too beautifull and precious to waste my time on anger. Jake is an excelent fellow and would jump down a Black Dragon's throat to save me ...if he did't trip over his own feet first. I am lucky to have such a goods friend. Life is good and though my heart is shrivalled and black; there are times when I do something very good and kind. Everything will work out fine.

<FONT color=#990000>Well, I see that this<FONT color=#990000>...</FONT> wise course does not...commend itself to you? Not yet. Not if some better way can be contrived.?</FONT><FONT color=#3333ff> Well, I am as busy as Iever possibly could be. With "Merchant of Venice", "Romeo and Juliet" and "The Complete Works of William Shakespeare (abridged). Much memorizing and rehersals but it is well worth it.</FONT><FONT color=#990000>...The ruling ring? And why not Gandalf? Why not? The power would pass to us if we could but command it!</FONT>
<FONT color=#000099 size=4>Well, things are just about as stupid as they can get. But strangely I am just fine, so...I have only up to go from here yeah!? Rock on!</FONT>

Well, this has turned out to be a strange day. I'm not entirely sure how I feel but it isn't happy. I guess I've put on the 'tough guy soldier' routine. It's stupid and anti-social but then, it does sometimes help. I have no one to blame but myself. I feel like an old tree bent under winter snow. Not as a result of age but of indesicive immaturity. I'm sure it will quelish as I get back to my good habits and spirituality. How much time that will take I do not know. However, I never give up.

Well, I am not in search of any kind of "sole companion" but they sure seem to be hunting for me. I don't know why and perhaps I shouldn't say but...the last few nights I have slept(only slept) with different girls. Now normally this would be considered male slut behavior but I was not looking for it to happen; it just did. Unfortunately though the complexity of these particular intimate moments has now come back to haunt me. Each girl expressed interest in continuing a serious relationship and in some cases a sexual one. I didn't anticipate this and so now I have "a whole lotta shit" to deal with and it's my own fault. I am not a 'man-whore', I just like sleeping next to beautiful women; and when there are an abundance of them that wouldn't mind a big tall sleeping buddy...well...I just don't say no. -Should I? Yeah, I guess I should; but then I have to decide if the situation presented itself again would I? I am forced to answer yes. Oh well, I am not fit to be loved anyway. so I may as well enjoy this while it lasts. Live it up and all.   Rock On!
